episodesJson.title: Rev. William Sloane Coffin and Ossie Davis
episodesJson.description: Reverend William Sloane Coffin, Yale University chaplain who had been indicted for counseling young men to resist the draft; and actor Ossie Davis. Both discuss antiwar mobilization in Washington, D.C.

creator.name: National Association of Educational Broadcasters, WAMU-FM (Radio station : Washington, D.C.)
